PublicService.name: Inclusion in the Register of Curators of the Neighborhood Nannies Action

evs.name: Police ID card
evs.description: For non-Schengen citizens of a third country. Alternatively, it can be a simple passport

evs.name: Residence permit with access to the labor market
evs.description: For non-Schengen citizens of a third country. Alternatively, it may be Single-Type Residence Permit Details, Special Identity Card Details for an Expatriate, Residence Certificate Details, Registration Certificate Details or Request for Residence Permit Renewal Submission

evs.name: Copy of secondary education, higher education or other equivalent foreign qualification
evs.description: Alternatively, it can be a copy of the compulsory education diploma and a certificate of successful completion of the asynchronous training program for Curators, a copy of the diploma of the Higher School of Nursery Nurses of the MITERA Infant Center or of PIKPA of Ioannina or Corresponding equivalence of a degree from DOATAP or DIKATSA, in case of obtaining a degree abroad

evs.name: Recognized certificate of Greek language proficiency level B1
evs.description: It concerns foreign candidates who are not graduates of secondary, post-secondary or tertiary education in Greece.

evs.name: First aid certificate for infants and children
evs.description: First aid certificate for infants and children

evs.name: Certificate/opinion from a Pathologist or General Practitioner
Solemn declaration of article 2, par. 2.3, point viii of the Invitation
evs.description: You must not have lost parental responsibility, or have lost the right to exercise it (if you are a parent), not be under judicial support, not have been convicted of a felony or misdemeanor, and must declare any change in the information registered in the Guardians' Registry.

evs.name: Affidavit recording the number of adult cohabitants in the residence and their relationship with the Curator
evs.description: Only in the event that the Curator provides the services in his/her home

criterion_requirements.name: Holder of a university, technical institute, vocational training institute degree or a graduate of Vocational Education or a post-secondary year of Apprenticeship in a relevant specialty or a graduate of compulsory education.

Good mental and physical health as well as the absence of a contagious skin disease, proven by a certificate/opinion from a Psychiatrist, Pathologist, Dermatologist or general practitioner within the last three months.
Permanently and legally residing in Greece.
Knowledge of providing first aid to children and ability to understand and speak the Greek language at language proficiency level B1.
